hops.message: Frontend uses mock data instead of API calls - no actual integration with backend endpoint
Route defined as GET /v1/admin/users with proper pagination and filtering
Uses require_admin dependency which depends on get_current_user from auth.py
Queries User model with SQLModel select, supports filtering by role, status, and search
User model with proper fields and UserRead response model defined
Admin router properly included in FastAPI application
Basic router test exists but only tests 401 response, no comprehensive endpoint testing

defects.msg: Frontend uses hardcoded mock data instead of calling the actual /v1/admin/users API endpoint - complete disconnect between UI and backend
No comprehensive test for admin users endpoint - only tests basic 401 authentication error
Frontend User interface doesn't match backend UserRead model - missing fields like is_verified, email_verified, profile_completion
Function name 'get_all_users' doesn't follow the expected naming convention from targets.json which suggests 'admin_get_all_users_GET'
